Sheet.name: Shapes
Sheet.Shape:
<style type="text/css">
				.st1{
					fill: url(#SVG-GR-1);
					stroke: #111111;
					stroke-width: 2;
				}
			</style>
			<linearGradient id="SVG-GR-1" x1=".5" y1=".1" x2=".5" y2=".9">
				<stop offset="0%" stop-color="#5555bb" />
				<stop offset="45%" stop-color="#eeeeff" />
				<stop offset="54%" stop-color="#555555" />
				<stop offset="100%" stop-color="#dddddd" />
			</linearGradient>
			<rect class="st1" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%"/>

<style type="text/css">
				.st0 {
					fill: transparent;
					stroke-width: 2;
					stroke: #888;
				}
			</style>
			<g class="title" transform="translate(0 -11)">
				<text x="50%" y="0" font-size="14" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Title</text>
			</g>
			<g class="caption" transform="translate(0 23)">
				<text x="50%" y="100%" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Caption</text>
			</g>
			<rect class="st0" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" rx="10"/>

<style type="text/css">
				.st2{
					fill: url(#SVG-GR-2);
					filter: drop-shadow(4px 4px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5));
				}
			</style>
			<radialGradient id="SVG-GR-2" cx="0.25" cy="0.25" r="0.75">
				<stop offset="0%" stop-color="#aaddff"/>
				<stop offset="100%" stop-color="#336699"/>
			</radialGradient>
			<circle class="st2" cx="50" cy="50" r="50"/>

<style type="text/css">
				.st21{
					fill: #336633;
				}
			</style>
			<ellipse class="st21" cx="100" cy="50" rx="100" ry="50" />

Sheet.name: Shapes 2
Sheet.Shape:
<style type="text/css">
				.st3{
					fill: #fcad2a;
					stroke-width: 3;
					stroke: #336699;
					stroke-dasharray: 6,3;
					filter: drop-shadow(4px 4px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5));
				}
			</style>
			<polygon class="st3" points="97,97 50,3.6 3,97 "/>

Sheet.name: Lines
Sheet.Shape:
<style type="text/css">
				.st6{
					fill: transparent;
					stroke-width: 2;
					stroke: #333333;
				}
			</style>
			<path class="st6" d="M0,100 C20,-50 90,80 100,0"/>

<style type="text/css">
				.st4{
					stroke-width: 2;
					stroke: #333333;
				}
			</style>
			<line class="st4" x1="0" y1="30" x2="100" y2="0"/>

<style type="text/css">
				.st5{
					stroke-width: 2;
					stroke: #333333;
				}
			</style>
			<line class="st5" x1="0" y1="0" x2="100" y2="120"/>
